DOC.brief_summary: The investigators believe that irradication of nose colonization of staphyloccocus aureus will reduce the incidence of surgical site infections after cesarean section.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intranasal Mupirocin on Rate of Staphylococcus Aureus Surgical Site Infection Following Cesarean Sections
DOC.criteria: Women assigned to undergo cesarean section All others
